subject: RE: Christmas trading hours
preview: Hi Rosanna, Sure, confirming we have actioned the below: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosanna, 

Sure, confirming we have actioned the below: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Sorry forgot Heath

Can we remove the double teddy bear and leave the drink image

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Heath

Thank you,

I have just checked the video on the home page and it doesn't open up to the valentine, I am not sure if this has anything to do with what I am doing

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Micheal and Rosanna, 

Confirming the below Valentines Day updates have been made to the home page: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/

@heath this instructions for http://www.machiavelli.com.au/?

The said video is including on the attached email and the 3 images where I used that.

Thanks,
Manuel M

Hi Heath and team, Can you please complete the following dev work valentines.
  1. Add the valentines video to the home page and above the other videos.
  2. Replace all hero shots with the attached valentines images with call to actions linking to the menu page (please leave the current rose hero shot and have that last)
Images in order
  • Teddy Bear
  • Table for two
  • Cheesecake with lights
Please let me know if you have any questions. Keep eating, Mick Founder and Chief Diner Mobile: +61 422 023 463 http://www.hungrydiner.com.au/ www.instagram.com/hungry_diner/ https://www.zomato.com/hungrydiner

Hi Rosanna, 

Ok sure, no problems at all. Just let me know specifically which images you would like us to use and we will load them in right away.

Hi Heath,

Thank you, although the image of the rose is very beautiful we would prefer to use our own images and would like to change the other banner images as well. Michael has a few images that he has already sent to you, and I am waiting for a action one of our pastry chef.

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna, 

Sure, confirming Manuel updated the home page slider for you yesterday as well.
@manuel excellent - all good now. The only change I had to make was the 2019 in the main menu, image attached.  Thanks
@heath ok updated but please check first if I did right :) Thanks.
@manuel She means the home page slider. There is probably a draft one that was used last year. We can reuse that one.
@heath what does it mean? :) confusing.

Hi Manuel

Is the home page banner going to be changed to reflect Valentine coming up

Kind Regards

Rosanna



Machiavelli Ristorante Italiano

123 Clarence Street
Sydney NSW 2000
Ph. 61 2 9299 3748
Fax. 61 2 9262 1490
Email. info@machiavelli.com.au

http://www.machiavelli.com.au/

Machiavelli is open Monday to Friday, lunch and dinner and Saturday dinner.

Closed Sundays and public holidays.

Hi Rosanna, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/events/valentines-day-menu/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

@manuel can you please add the prices, for example the first item INSALATA CAPRESE is $29. 

You might have been confused as on the word doc they don't have the $ signs. 

Can you also change the page title, URL and main menu item (under events) to say 2020 and not 2019. 

Once all of the above is done, you can send the client notification email. 

Thanks

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body: @manuel can you please update the valentines day menu on this page: https://www.machiavelli.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=2939&action=edit <https://www.machiavelli.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=2939&action=edit> with the attached word doc cheers.

Hi Heath,
I hope your are enjoying your break.
I have enclosed our 2020 Mini a la carte Valentines menu which can be uploaded when you can.

Kind Regards

Rosanna
